[[Valinor]] ([[Taniquetil]]) | affiliation= | language=[[Vanyarin]] | birth=Between {{YT|1050}} and {{YT|1102|n}} | birthlocation=[[Cuiviénen]] | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage= | siblings= | spouse=[[Ingwë]] | children=Unnamed children (including [[Ingwion]]) | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Ilwen''' was the wife of [[Ingwë]], King of the [[Vanyar]]. == History == Ilwen was born at [[Cuiviénen]], likely to the more junior generations of the [[Minyar]]. She wed [[Ingwë]], who was a direct male-line descendant of [[Imin]], from eldest son to eldest son. The couple were wed and had several children at Cuiviénen by the time [[Oromë]] found the [[Quendi]] and invited them to [[Aman]].{{NM|P1xvii}}, p. 128 Ilwen probably accompanied Ingwë and the rest of the Vanyar to [[Valinor]], as it is said that Ingwë begat many children in the bliss of Aman, as noted by [[Finwë]] when he complained to the [[Valar]] about his widowhood following the death of [[Míriel]].{{MR|P3II2}}, p. 206 == Etymology == According to ''[[Eldamo]]'', the name ''Ilwen'' seems to be in [[Quenya]], but its meaning is unclear.{{webcite|author=[[Paul Strack]]|articleurl=http://eldamo.org/content/words/word-802758671.html|articlename=Q.
